content: quote: BAGHDAD (Reuters) - A U.S. military spokesman confirmed on Monday that U.S. forces shot down an unmanned Iranian aircraft in Iraqi airspace last month. "Coalition multi-role jet fighters shot down an unmanned Iranian (aircraft) on February 25, approximately 60 miles northeast of Baghdad ... the UAV had been tracked by coalition air forces for nearly 1 hour and 10 minutes before it was engaged and shot down well inside Iraqi airspace," the spokesman said. +http://www.washingtonpost.com/wp-dyn/content/article/2009/03/16/AR2009031601228.html?hpid=moreheadlines
quote: BAGHDAD (Reuters) - A U.S. military spokesman confirmed on Monday that U.S. forces shot down an unmanned Iranian aircraft in Iraqi airspace last month. "Coalition multi-role jet fighters shot down an unmanned Iranian (aircraft) on February 25, approximately 60 miles northeast of Baghdad ... the UAV had been tracked by coalition air forces for nearly 1 hour and 10 minutes before it was engaged and shot down well inside Iraqi airspace," the spokesman said.
title: U.S. confirms downing Iranian drone over Iraq

content: quote: Originally posted by 67NOV: Thanks Knele for the pics. That's what I like about this site, folks like yourself that have info/pics on hand. Someday I'll learn how to post a pic! it's easy find the site that has the pic you want to post. right click the picture you want then click copy link. then click on the green icon next to the letter icon. paste the copy link in to the writing area of it. click OK and it should work.
quote: Originally posted by 67NOV: Thanks Knele for the pics. That's what I like about this site, folks like yourself that have info/pics on hand. Someday I'll learn how to post a pic!
reply: it's easy find the site that has the pic you want to post. right click the picture you want then click copy link. then click on the green icon next to the letter icon. paste the copy link in to the writing area of it. click OK and it should work.
